Text.Page:
After the recent kidnappings, we forbade normal traffic anywhere near the Hungry Caverns.

But that just made the gulas bolder.

Let's keep them from getting too cocky. Kill the {@LinkCreature:8#1011#hulking sentries} and {@LinkCreature:8#1021#cromos prowlers} in Vexatus Swamp. That'll teach them to fear the federation!
Those gulas are going to think twice before making a meal out of us, eh?
